title: Shady Or Not? He'll Date Her But Under One Condition
description:
You connected with someone, and you two started dating. But they’ve done something that makes you question their character. And now you’re not certain if you should continue dating them or not – and that’s where we come in! Tell us your situation, and we’ll tell you if their offense is shady or not.
She just started dating a guy she met through her former coworkers. Because of this, he wants to keep their dating life a secret for professional reasons. Is this legit or sketchy? We discuss.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
